BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWCA_CANTEEN_INGREDIENT_MST (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_INGREDIENT_ID,STR_INGREDIENT_NAME,STR_INGREDIENT_RATE,STR_RATE_PER_UNIT,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GSTR_REMARKS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_INGREDIENT_MST T SET T.STR_INGREDIENT_NAME=?,T.STR_INGREDIENT_RATE=?,T.STR_RATE_PER_UNIT=?,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?, T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?, T.GSTR_REMARKS =?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.NUM_INGREDIENT_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWCA_CANTEEN_INGREDIENT_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_INGREDIENT_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
